cu.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the RRC logging system to fail initialization and prevent proper radio resource control monitoring.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an out-of-range value 99 will cause configuration validation failure and prevent proper MIMO operation setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為超出範圍的值 99 會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的 MIMO 操作設置。
